library(MASS)
library(tidyverse)
require(gridExtra)

# heat map function for correlation matrxi

h_map <- function(x,cor = F) {
  if(cor == F){
    Cor <- cor(x) %>% abs(.)
  } else {
    Cor <- x %>% abs(.)
  }
  
  h1 <- ggplot(data = melt(Cor), aes(x=(Var1), y= (Var2), fill=value)) + 
    scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "blue") +
    geom_tile() +
    theme(axis.text.x  = element_text(angle=90))
  h1
}
